channel.title: Specifications on AsyncAPI Initiative
channel.description: Recent content in Specifications on AsyncAPI Initiative

item.title: AsyncAPI specification 1.0.0
item.description: Disclaimer Part of this content has been taken from the great work done by the folks at the Open API Initiative. Mainly because it’s a great work and we want to keep as much compatibility as possible with the Open API Specification. Version 1.0.0 The key words “MUST”, “MUST NOT”, “REQUIRED”, “SHALL”, “SHALL NOT”, “SHOULD”, “SHOULD NOT”, “RECOMMENDED”, “MAY”, and “OPTIONAL” in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.
